settings.text:
Why Choose Buildmat Kitchen Mixer Taps

We’re a 100% Australian owned and operated retailer of high-quality building materials which includes our range of modern kitchen mixer taps. We live by the motto that if it’s not a product we’d have in our own home, then we won’t be selling it. We continually have our fingers on the pulse to bring you the latest building materials that are premium quality and beautifully designed.

settings.title: Functional & Premium Mixer Taps
settings.text: Upgrade the look, feel and functionality of your kitchen with Buildmat's bespoke kitchen tapware. From pull out mixers in brushed nickel, to stunning brass gold square pull outsink mixers, Buildmat’s sink mixer taps suit any home, making your kitchen look good and enhancing the functionality of your kitchen workspace. Made with the highest quality materials that have a WELS 4 star rating or more, you won’t find a better range of premium contemporary pull-outkitchen mixer taps than right here at Buildmat.

settings.title: Pull Out Mixer Tap Benefits
settings.text: Pull-out kitchen mixer taps have several benefits. With a shorter spout, they are well-suited for small to medium-sized sinks where pull-down models wouldn’t be a practical option. Pull outkitchen mixer taps allow you to easily and thoroughly wash items like fruit, veggies and even both hands. A longer pull-out hose is convenient as it helps fill up pots and pans further from the sink area, minimising splashing in your sink and around the bench. If you’re looking to save space, pull outkitchen mixer taps are also the ultimate space-savers.

settings.title: Available in 6 Premium Colour Finishes
settings.text: Brushed nickel, black and brass are trendy options for contemporary kitchens, while a stainless steel or chrome swivelmixer tap offers a timeless look and feel, opt for. You can’t go wrong with a Buildmat stainless steel, brushed nickel, gunmetal, brushed copper or brushed brass gold kitchen mixer tap. All of our pull outmixer taps are made with the utmost care and quality, making any mixer the right choice for your kitchen.

settings.title: Pairing Your Mixer Tap & Kitchen Sink
settings.text: When pairing your kitchen mixer tap and kitchen sink, we recommend a pull-out spray mixer. It’s a kitchen hack that will make your life so much easier – especially when it comes to spraying things like pots, pans and even veggies and fruit hands-free. A pull-out mixer makes cleaning and washing your sink down easier, and reduces splash as you control the exact direction of the water. Sinks come in various sizes in width, length, and depth. We suggest a deep sink if you have the space because it holds more dishes and large pots and pans, but it also pairs more efficiently with a pull-outkitchen mixer tap.

settings.title: What’s the Best Colour Combination for Kitchen Mixer Taps?
settings.text: You want to ensure the colour of your kitchen mixer tap pairs well with the colour of your kitchen sink and the overall style of your kitchen. For a classic look, choose a stainless steelkitchen mixer tap. For something contemporary, a brushed nickel, brushed brass or gunmetalpulloutmixer tap is a good choice.

settings.title: Is a Kitchen Sink Mixer the Same As a Pull Out Mixer Tap?
settings.text: A kitchen sink mixer is a tap that is used over a sink (kitchen or laundry). They have a swivelspout to allow more use throughout the sink. Pull-out taps (also known as pull down sink mixers), allow you to pull out the tip of the tap on a retractable hose, which makes washing up and cleaning your kitchen sink a lot easier.

settings.title: What is the Warranty on Buildmat Kitchen Mixer Taps?
settings.text: Buildmat offers a 7 year warranty on all of its pull-outkitchen mixer taps for confidence and peace of mind.

settings.title: What is the Best Laundry Sink Mixer?
settings.text: A pull-out mixer is the best laundry sink mixer for efficient laundry time. This is especially true if you have a lot of washing going on and need to target different areas of the tub (or if you need to wash your pet). Coming in a range of colours and styles, if you want to upgrade your laundry experience, we have a range of premium pull-out laundry mixers.

settings.title: What Are the Best Recommended Kitchen Accessories?
settings.text: Along with kitchen mixer taps, we offer a range of custom-made kitchen accessories, whether it's a chopping board, dish rack, colander or roll mat we've designed to perfectly fit in our sink.

settings.title: Where is the Buildmat Showroom?
settings.text: Buildmat has both an online showroom where you can view our entire range, or an in-store showroom at 18 Babbage Dr, Dandenong South VIC 3175 Australia. Whether you're after pull-outkitchen mixer taps, matte blacktapware, gunmetal soap dispensers, chrome toilet roll holders, bathspouts or bathroom accessories, we’re here to help. Give us a call on 1300 123 122 and we can talk you through our range.
